alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Madison; Ringgold; Union; Warren (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 5:45AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A Area of Thunderstorm will Impact Portions of Southeastern Madison, eastern Union, northeastern Ringgold, northwestern Clarke and southwestern Warren Counties through 645 AM CDT... At 543 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles east of Creston, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail and brief heavy rainfall up to one-half inch is possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Ponding of water on roadways and brief low visibility while traveling this morning is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Madison, eastern Union, northeastern Ringgold, northwestern Clarke and southwestern Warren Counties, including the following locations... New Virginia, East Peru, Truro, Ellston, Thayer, Afton, Murray, Murray Roadside Rest Area, Lorimor and Tingley. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 32 and 48. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
